data.title: Health Technology Assessment
data.text:
ISSN: 2046-4924 (Online)

Impact Factor: 3.5

Ranking: 30/174 - Health Care Sciences & Services

Publishing schedule: Continuous (reports publish as and when they are ready for publication)

Health Technology Assessment (HTA) publishes research information on the effectiveness, costs and broader impact of health technologies for those who use, manage and provide care in the NHS.

Find out more about the HTA journal including:
